name: Cyanea (mikomoares, gubebra)
description:
Best played with Xbox/PS4 controller

For best user experience please download the game.

  • Retrieve the power aurea hidden on the map!
  • Unlock new characters with secret abilitys to reach new areas.
  • Explore a kingdom full of magical creatures.
  • Defeat the five powerfull elementals
  • Every enemie drop a number of souls. If you reach 20 of them (mana bar below health), you can max your HP.

Controls:

PS4

  • L1/R1- Change Players
  • X - Jump
  • Analog  - Movement
  • Circle/L2 - Super
  • Square/R2 - Attack

Xbox

Same PS4 analogy

Super:

Paladin -> Dash

Gobin -> Double Jump

Ogre -> Wall Jump

Vampire -> fly

Treatnant -> heal

Efreet -> Ranged

Keyboard

  • Q/E- Change Players
  • UP arrow - Jump
  • RIGHT/LEFT arrows  - Movement
  • F - Super
  • SPACE - Attack

Art:
https://iknowkingrabbit.itch.io/heroic-creature-pack

https://s4m-ur4i.itch.io/2d-metroidvania-tileset-16x16

Music and Sounds:
'Epic Departure [v2] ' by Of Far Different Nature (https://fardifferent.bandcamp.com/)
https://fardifferent.itch.io/loops
https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Made by:

  • gubebra (https://gubebra.itch.io/)
  • mikomoares (https://mikomoares.itch.io/)

This game is still in development, and depending on the feedback might turn into a big project on steam.
